verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> this, <S%G5023><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> corners <S%G1137><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> holding <S%G2902><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> winds <S%G417><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> so that <S%G2443><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> wind <S%G417><s%> would blow <S%G4154><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> or <S%G3383><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> or <S%G3383><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> tree. <S%G1186><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> ascend <S%G305><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the sunrise, <S%G2246><s%> <S%G2246><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the seal <S%G4973><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> to the four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> it <S%G846><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to harm <S%G91><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Don't <S%G3361><s%> harm <S%G91><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> the trees, <S%G1186><s%> until <S%G891><s%> <S%G3739><s%> we have sealed <S%G4972><s%> the bondservants <S%G1401><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> foreheads! <S%G3359><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who were sealed, <S%G4972><s%> one hundred <S%G1540><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> - four <S%G5064><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> sealed <S%G4972><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> tribe <S%G5443><s%> of the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel: <S%G2474><s%>

of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Judah <S%G2448><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Reuben <S%G4502><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Gad <S%G1045><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%>

of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Asher <S%G768><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Naphtali <S%G3508><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Manasseh <S%G3128><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%>

of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Simeon <S%G4826><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Levi <S%G3017><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Issachar <S%G2466><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%>

of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Zebulun <S%G2194><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Joseph <S%G2501><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Benjamin <S%G958><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> I looked, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G846><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> number, <S%G705><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of all tribes, <S%G5443><s%> <S%G2532><s%> peoples, <S%G2992><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> languages, <S%G1100><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> dressed <S%G4016><s%> in white <S%G3022><s%> robes, <S%G4749><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> palm branches <S%G5404><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hands. <S%G5495><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Salvation <S%G4991><s%> be to our <S%G2257><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> sits <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the Lamb! <S%G721><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> were standing <S%G2476><s%> around <S%G2945><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the elders, <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures; <S%G2226><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> faces <S%G4383><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> his throne, <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Amen! <S%G281><s%> Blessing, <S%G2129><s%> <S%G2532><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%> <S%G2532><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> <S%G2532><s%> thanksgiving, <S%G2169><s%> <S%G2532><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> <S%G2532><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> might, <S%G2479><s%> be to our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever! <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> "These <S%G3778><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> arrayed <S%G4016><s%> in white <S%G3022><s%> robes, <S%G4749><s%> who are they, <S%G2532><s%> and from where did they <S%G4159><s%> come? <S%G2064><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I told <S%G2046><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "My lord, <S%G2962><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> know. <S%G1492><s%>" <S%G2532><s%> He said <S%G2036><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> "These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> those who came <S%G2064><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> tribulation. <S%G2347><s%> <S%G2532><s%> They washed <S%G4150><s%> their <S%G846><s%> robes, <S%G4749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G3021><s%> them <S%G846><s%> white <S%G3021><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lamb <S%G4749><s%>'s blood. <S%G129><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> they <S%G1526><s%> are before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1526><s%> serve <S%G3000><s%> him <S%G846><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> temple. <S%G3485><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> who sits <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> will spread his tabernacle <S%G4637><s%> over them. <S%G846><s%>

They will never <S%G2089><s%> be <S%G3756><s%> hungry, <S%G3983><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> thirsty <S%G1372><s%> any <S%G3361><s%> more; <S%G2089><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> will the sun <S%G2246><s%> beat <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> heat; <S%G2738><s%>

for <S%G3754><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G303><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the throne <S%G2362><s%> shepherds <S%G4165><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> leads <S%G3594><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> springs <S%G4077><s%> of waters <S%G5204><s%> of life. <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will wipe away <S%G1813><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> tear <S%G1144><s%> from <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes. <S%G3788><s%>"
